announcements.title: The Cathedral will resume weekday Masses to a maximum of 10 people effective January 7th. Mass times below.
announcements.descriptive:
Due to a province-wide shutdown, the Cathedral Office will be closed until January 23rd, 2021.
Our schedule will be updated during the process of re-opening.

Be sure to
[join our mailing list](http://mailchi.mp/ac8e8cadb5e8/d…)
for the latest updates as they happen!

Parishioners are asked to review
[Worship Safe in Pictures and Points](http://peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGe…).

The televised Sunday Mass will continue on YouTube.
Check [Special events](#schedule2) below for information and links.

announcements.title: Join our mailing list
announcements.descriptive:
Be the first to know!
Stay in the loop with everything going on at The Cathedral.

Sign up to receive regular updates, announcements, links to bulletins, and more,
delivered straight to your inbox!

Let's stay connected.

[Sign up...](https://mailchi.mp/ac8e8cadb5e8/dont-miss-out)

regularEvents.title: Weekend Mass
regularEvents.descriptive:
At this time, Masses are cancelled until further notice.
The Cathedral will be open daily from 8:00am to 12:00pm for Private Prayer.
Maximum of 10 people inside the church.

regularEvents.title: Weekday Mass
regularEvents.descriptive:
Please join us for Mass.
Maximum of 10 people.
The Cathedral will be open daily from 8:00am to 12:00pm for Private Prayer.

regularEvents.title: Confession
regularEvents.descriptive: Maximum of 10 people in the Cathedral at any time.
